yaml.title: Analyzing the Opioid Epidemic

author.name: Charles Batsaikhan, Alayna Johnson, James Hernandez

yaml.description: Exploring the impact and trends of the opioid epidemic using data analysis and interactive visualizations.

markdown.markdown:
You can explore the Opioid Epidemic ShinyApp (link will be added). You can explore the source code [here](./code/app copy.R)
In this project, my group mates and I delve into the critical issue of the opioid epidemic, employing data analysis techniques and interactive visualizations to understand its impact and identify potential patterns. ## Objectives - **Data Exploration:** Dive into datasets related to opioid usage, overdose incidents, and associated factors. - **Trend Analysis:** Identify temporal trends and geographical patterns to better comprehend the evolution of the epidemic. - **Interactive Visualizations:** Utilize R and RShiny to create dynamic visualizations for enhanced data exploration. ## Methodology I approach the analysis with a combination of statistical methods and data visualization tools. Leveraging the power of R and RShiny, I aim to provide an insightful perspective on the opioid epidemic. ## Expected Outcomes Through this project, I anticipate shedding light on the opioid epidemic's dynamics, contributing valuable insights that may inform future interventions and policies.
